idea-plugin.name: Insprill's Dark Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Custom color scheme used by Insprill based on Eclipse's dark theme
and modified to my liking. Looks best with the One Dark Theme.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.2:
Changed background color to match One Dark's.

1.0.1:
Changed keyword brownish-orange to purple.

1.0.0:
Initial release.
